subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Vitaly Vishnevski and Dainius Zubrus scored 4 minutes 15 seconds apart in the first period Friday night as the host Devils won their ninth consecutive game by defeating the Washington Capitals, 3-2.
snippet: Vitaly Vishnevski and Dainius Zubrus scored 4 minutes 15 seconds apart in the first period Friday night as the host Devils won their ninth consecutive game by defeating the Washington Capitals, 3-2.
